import React from 'react' import { AuthConsumer } from './AuthContext' import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button'; import TextField from '@material-ui/core/TextField'; import Grid from '@material-ui/core/Grid'; class UserForm extends React.Component { emailInput = React.createRef() passwordInput = React.createRef() render() { return ( {({ password, passwordError, emailError, error, logIn }) => (

Sign In

Use your google account


Email can contain period.
)} ) } } export default UserForm
